meanings.definition: A person who dishonestly claims to have special knowledge and skill in some field, typically medicine.
meanings.sent1: The town was fooled by the quacks who promised miracle cures.
meanings.sent2: The quacks selling fake medicines were finally exposed by the authorities.
meanings.sent3: The quacks tried to sell a potion that turned out to be just colored water.
meanings.sent4: Beware of the quacks who prey on vulnerable patients seeking help.
meanings.sent5: The quacks' deceitful practices led to many people being harmed.

meanings.definition: The harsh, throaty cry of a duck or similar bird.
meanings.sent1: The quacks of the ducks echoed across the tranquil pond.
meanings.sent2: I woke up to the familiar quacks of the ducks outside my window.
meanings.sent3: The quacks of the ducks added a peaceful soundtrack to the park.
meanings.sent4: The quacks of the ducks filled the air with a symphony of nature.
meanings.sent5: The quacks of the ducks were a soothing melody on a quiet afternoon.
